function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perception of entrepreneurial opportunity during crisis","Impact":"Risk of overlooking the gravity of the crisis and focusing solely on entrepreneurial opportunities, potentially neglecting public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidance to entrepreneurs on public health priorities and the need to balance entrepreneurial opportunities with public health considerations.","Technologies":"Public health messaging, educational resources for entrepreneurs.","People":"Entrepreneurs, businesspeople in the entrepreneurial ecosystem.","Owner":"Public health authorities, business associations."},{"Description":"Adversity and coping strategies in startups","Impact":"Potential for startups to neglect public health measures and focus solely on coping strategies, increasing the risk of disease propagation in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Offer support and resources for startups to balance coping strategies with public health responsibilities.","Technologies":"Online support platforms, virtual counseling sessions.","People":"Startups, entrepreneurs, employees in startup environments.","Owner":"Startup support organizations, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Barriers in policy support services for startups","Impact":"Risk of startups facing challenges in accessing and implementing policy support services, leading to potential neglect of public health requirements.","Mitigation":"Streamline and tailor policy support services for startups, ensuring clear communication and accessibility.","Technologies":"Digital application platforms, online policy guidance resources.","People":"Startups, policymakers, entrepreneurs.","Owner":"Government agencies, startup support organizations."}]}
